Invalid response from server. Please try again later.

Currently Kikr and the products featured within it can only be purchased and shipped to US and Canadian residents.\n\n We are working hard to support international shipments before 2016 however all users have the ability to create and share collections in anticipation of earning credits to be used at a later time. We will store all credits earned for use in the future!!
Outside of the US & Canada?\nEarn credits now and use them later!
Kikr only ships to US & Canada Addresses for now.
2 credits for every $1 you spend on Kikr\n
If another user shares an item from your collections with their followers, you split credit commissions at 2.5 credits per $1 spent
Earn 5 credits for every $1 spent by another user from one of your collections.
Failed to get final value of cart. Please try again later.

Purchased Confirmed!
You can track the status in Orders next to My Wallet.

Happy Shopping

We at Kikr work tirelessly to bring you name brand products from authentic merchants. You purchase directly from the merchants so you get to take advantage of the same return and exchange policy as those shopping directly on the merchant’s website, but with the benefit of Kikr rewards!
Fulfillment and shipping of all products for sale on Kikr are handled by the merchants, not by Kikr.

string.name: purchase_guarantee_line3
string.b: Have a question about your order status, shipment, or returns/exchanges?

resources.string: Please contact the merchant directly. We provide a list of contact information for our merchants here.

string.b: Have a question a technical question about the app?

resources.string: If you have any trouble contacting a merchant directly, please don’t hesitate to reach out to our team for assistance, but know that direct contact with the merchant is usually the quickest & best way to get something resolved.
